text:
@GOPLeader @HouseGOP @SteveScalise @RepLizCheney @MacTXPress @RodneyDavis As stupid as he is, hard to believe IDIOT-IN-CHIEF @realDonaldTrump would retweet a garbage tweet like this (whose author supposedly represents California).

Shows you neither he, nor @GOPLeader care what's happening in California/the U.S.

PATHETIC!

https://t.co/D2xH5S1ZGs
